Battle your opponent in a dramatic battle to see who becomes big enough toÂ eat the other. Consume delicious food that will make you bigger, and able to eat even more!*","marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"*Minor side-effects possible...","marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Gorf vs. Frog was the result of a succesful game jam we had in December 2022.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Find the game here: ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://frogsong-studios.itch.io/gorfvsfrog"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"LINK","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.youtube.com/embed/SMBbYCBlADQ"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SMBbYCBlADQ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

nodes.title: New Website
nodes.shortText: RIBBIT, and welcome to our newly updated, super fresh website!

nodes.title: D-Corp on Nintendo Switch
nodes.shortText: Frogsong Studios are happy to announce that D-Corp was released on Nintendo Switch the 21st of July 2023, in collaboration with Red Deer Games.

nodes.title: D-Corp Arena Mode
nodes.shortText: This free update introduces PvP - player-versus-player gameplay.
